alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Houston; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bibb, northwestern Twiggs and north central Houston Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 715 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Payne City, or near Macon, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Warner Robins, Centerville, Payne, Payne City, Rutland, Huber, Wesleyan, Dry Branch, Skipperton, Elberta, Franklinton, and Middle Georgia Regional Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
